SqlCmd.name: DeleteRolesById
SqlCmd.CmdLine: delete from tb_usergroup where id in(@roles)

SqlCmd.name: DeleteUserById
SqlCmd.CmdLine: delete from tb_user where id in(@roles)

SqlCmd.name: GetBlogTitle
SqlCmd.CmdLine: select p.PostId, p.Title,b.Name from Posts p left join Blogs b on p.BlogId=b.BlogId

SqlCmd.name: SearchGoodsByName
SqlCmd.CmdLine: select good.Code,good.Name as GoodsName,good.Numbers as StockNum,info.SalePrice as Price,good.SaleCount from Tb_Goods good left join Tb_GoodsInfo info on good.Id=info.GoodsId where 1=1 and IsShow=1 @whereStr

SqlCmd.name: GetUserCartgoInfo
SqlCmd.CmdLine: select userid as Ssid, stockCode as StockCode, goods.name as GoodsName, BuyCnt, CurPrice, BuyCnt*CurPrice as TotalPrice from Tb_CartGo cartgo left join Tb_Goods goods on cartgo.StockCode=goods.code where IsPay!=1 and cartgo.userid='@ssid'

SqlCmd.name: RmUserCartgo
SqlCmd.CmdLine: delete from Tb_CartGo where userid='@ssid' and stockCode='@code';

SqlCmd.name: SubmitOrder
SqlCmd.CmdLine: update Tb_CartGo set IsPay=1,OrderId='@orderId' where userid='@ssid' and IsPay<>1
